activities.details: Upon arrival, you will be greeted by your private driver and transferred to your luxurious resort in Shillong. Enjoy a comfortable ride and admire the scenic landscapes on the way.

activities.activity: Check-in at Vivanta by Taj - Shillong
activities.details: Settle in at your 5-star resort, Vivanta by Taj - Shillong, renowned for its breathtaking views, luxurious amenities, and impeccable service.
Indulge in a delightful afternoon tea experience at The Orchid, known for its beautiful gardens and delectable pastries.
Embark on a scenic drive to Elephant Falls, a picturesque waterfall cascading down a series of rocky steps. Enjoy the tranquility of the surrounding rainforest.
Savor a delicious dinner at a local restaurant, showcasing the flavors of Meghalayan cuisine.
Explore the serene beauty of Umiam Lake, a picturesque lake surrounded by lush greenery. Take a boat ride or enjoy a leisurely walk around the lake.
Experience the grandeur of Nohkalikai Falls, the tallest plunge waterfall in India, cascading from a breathtaking height.
Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local eatery, savoring the authentic flavors of Meghalayan cuisine.
Embark on a scenic drive to Seven Sisters Falls, a series of seven cascading waterfalls. Enjoy the beauty of the natural surroundings.
Return to your resort in Shillong, enjoying the scenic views on the way.
Indulge in a delicious dinner at The Orchid, enjoying the ambiance of the restaurant.
Ascend Shillong Peak, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the city and surrounding valleys. Capture stunning photographs and enjoy the fresh mountain air.
Take a leisurely stroll through Lady Hydari Park, a beautiful park with colorful flowers, a children's play area, and a serene ambiance.
Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant, savoring the flavors of Meghalayan cuisine.
Explore the fascinating Don Bosco Museum, showcasing the history and culture of Meghalaya, including tribal artifacts, art, and photographs.
Enjoy a relaxing evening at your resort, soaking in the tranquil atmosphere and experiencing the luxurious amenities.

activities.activity: Dinner at Vivanta by Taj - Shillong
activities.details: Indulge in a delectable dinner at your resort's restaurant, savoring the fine dining experience.
Embark on a scenic drive to Cherrapunji, renowned for its breathtaking waterfalls, lush forests, and captivating views.
Experience the grandeur of Seven Sisters Falls, a series of seven cascading waterfalls, surrounded by lush greenery.
Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant, savoring the flavors of Meghalayan cuisine.
Witness the awe-inspiring Nohkalikai Falls, the tallest plunge waterfall in India, cascading from a breathtaking height.
Venture into the mysterious Mawsmai Cave, a limestone cave with stunning formations, offering a glimpse into the geological wonders of the region.

activities.activity: Check-in at The Heritage Village Resort
activities.details: Check-in at The Heritage Village Resort, a luxurious resort nestled amidst the picturesque landscapes of Cherrapunji, offering serene views and luxurious amenities.

activities.activity: Dinner at The Heritage Village Resort
activities.details: Indulge in a delicious dinner at the resort's restaurant, savoring the flavors of Meghalayan cuisine.
Experience the grandeur of Nohkalikai Falls, the tallest plunge waterfall in India, cascading from a breathtaking height.
Explore the serene Eco Park, a beautiful park with lush gardens, scenic views, and a peaceful ambiance.
Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant, savoring the flavors of Meghalayan cuisine.
Experience the beauty of Wahkaba Falls, a picturesque waterfall cascading down a rocky cliff, surrounded by lush greenery.
Witness the remarkable Living Root Bridges, a unique and awe-inspiring network of bridges naturally grown from the roots of rubber trees, offering a glimpse into the ingenuity of nature.
Return to your resort in Cherrapunji, enjoying the scenic views on the way.

activities.activity: Dinner at The Heritage Village Resort
activities.details: Indulge in a delicious dinner at the resort's restaurant, savoring the flavors of Meghalayan cuisine.
Experience the grandeur of Nohkalikai Falls, the tallest plunge waterfall in India, cascading from a breathtaking height.
Explore the serene Eco Park, a beautiful park with lush gardens, scenic views, and a peaceful ambiance.
Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant, savoring the flavors of Meghalayan cuisine.
Experience the beauty of Wahkaba Falls, a picturesque waterfall cascading down a rocky cliff, surrounded by lush greenery.
Witness the remarkable Living Root Bridges, a unique and awe-inspiring network of bridges naturally grown from the roots of rubber trees, offering a glimpse into the ingenuity of nature.
Return to your resort in Cherrapunji, enjoying the scenic views on the way.

activities.activity: Dinner at The Heritage Village Resort
activities.details: Indulge in a delicious dinner at the resort's restaurant, savoring the flavors of Meghalayan cuisine.
Embark on a scenic drive back to Guwahati, enjoying the landscapes of Meghalaya on the way.
Experience the spiritual significance of Kamakhya Temple, an ancient temple dedicated to the goddess Kamakhya, known for its religious and cultural importance.
Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant, savoring the flavors of Assamese cuisine.
Explore the serene Umananda Temple, a sacred temple located on an island in the Brahmaputra River, offering a peaceful escape.
Enjoy a relaxing evening in Guwahati, strolling through the bustling markets or enjoying a peaceful sunset by the Brahmaputra River.
Indulge in a delicious dinner at a local restaurant, savoring the flavors of Assamese cuisine.
Enjoy a comfortable transfer to Guwahati Airport for your departure.

itinerary.destination: Florence, Metropolitan City of Florence, Italy

activities.details: Arrive at Florence Airport and transfer to your luxurious hotel. Settle in, unpack, and enjoy a relaxing afternoon.

activities.activity: Lunch at La Terrazza Rooftop Restaurant
activities.details: Enjoy a delicious Italian lunch with stunning views of Florence at the opulent La Terrazza Rooftop Restaurant at the Hotel Pitti Palace al Ponte Vecchio.

activities.activity: Private Guided Tour of Palazzo Pitti
activities.details: Embark on a private guided tour of Palazzo Pitti, one of Florence's grandest palaces, exploring its exquisite art collections and gardens.

activities.activity: Dinner at Gucci Osteria da Massimo Bottura
activities.details: Dine at the acclaimed Gucci Osteria da Massimo Bottura, known for its innovative Italian cuisine and elegant atmosphere.
Take a romantic evening stroll across the Ponte Vecchio, the only bridge in Florence that was spared destruction during World War II, admiring its charming shops and the illuminated cityscape.
Explore the Uffizi Gallery, a world-renowned art museum showcasing masterpieces by Florentine Renaissance artists like Leonardo da Vinci, Michelangelo, and Botticelli.
Enjoy a traditional Tuscan lunch at Trattoria Sabatino, known for its authentic flavors and cozy ambiance.
Ascend to the top of Brunelleschi's Dome for panoramic views of Florence, then explore the interior of the Duomo, a masterpiece of Gothic architecture.
See Michelangelo's iconic David statue at the Galleria dell'Accademia, alongside other Florentine Renaissance sculptures.

activities.activity: Aperitivo and Dinner at La Giostra
activities.details: Experience a traditional Italian aperitivo at La Giostra, a popular restaurant known for its lively atmosphere and delicious Tuscan cuisine.
Learn the secrets of Tuscan cuisine in a private cooking class, preparing authentic dishes with local ingredients and enjoying a delicious meal afterwards.
Enjoy a delightful lunch at La Cocotte, a charming restaurant specializing in French cuisine with a Tuscan twist.
Explore the Bargello, a museum housing a remarkable collection of Renaissance sculptures, including works by Donatello and Michelangelo.
Relax and enjoy a leisurely stroll through the Boboli Gardens, a stunning Renaissance garden with fountains, sculptures, and panoramic views of Florence.
Dine at the elegant La Terrazza restaurant, located in the heart of Florence and offering exquisite Italian cuisine and breathtaking views.
Enjoy a day trip to the beautiful medieval town of Siena, exploring its historic center, Piazza del Campo, and enjoying a traditional Tuscan lunch.
Explore the impressive Siena Cathedral, known for its stunning Gothic architecture and artwork.
Return to Florence and enjoy a relaxing evening at your hotel.

activities.activity: Visit the Museo di San Marco
activities.details: Explore the Museo di San Marco, a former monastery housing iconic frescoes by Fra Angelico, showcasing his masterful style.
Enjoy a delightful lunch at La Buchetta, a traditional Tuscan restaurant known for its regional specialties and warm hospitality.
Stroll across the Ponte Santa Trinita, one of the oldest bridges in Florence, known for its picturesque views and charming architecture.

activities.activity: Visit the Museo di Palazzo Davanzati
activities.details: Explore the Museo di Palazzo Davanzati, a museum showcasing a 14th-century Florentine palazzo, offering a glimpse into the lifestyle of a wealthy family during the Renaissance.
Dine at the charming La Cocotte restaurant, savoring its French-inspired cuisine and romantic atmosphere.

activities.activity: Visit the Museo di Palazzo Vecchio
activities.details: Explore the Museo di Palazzo Vecchio, a museum housed in a stunning Renaissance palace, showcasing art and history from the 14th to 16th centuries.

activities.activity: Lunch at La Terrazza Rooftop Restaurant
activities.details: Enjoy a delicious Italian lunch with breathtaking views of Florence at the opulent La Terrazza Rooftop Restaurant at the Hotel Pitti Palace al Ponte Vecchio.
Embark on a private wine tasting at a renowned local winery, sampling exquisite Tuscan wines and learning about their production process.
Dine at the elegant La Terrazza restaurant, located in the heart of Florence and offering exquisite Italian cuisine and breathtaking views.
Enjoy a leisurely morning at your hotel, taking advantage of the luxurious amenities and relaxing by the pool.
Enjoy a delightful lunch at La Cocotte, savoring its French-inspired cuisine and romantic atmosphere.
Explore the charming boutiques and artisan shops of Florence, discovering unique souvenirs and local crafts.

activities.activity: Farewell Dinner at Gucci Osteria da Massimo Bottura
activities.details: Enjoy a final delicious Italian dinner at the acclaimed Gucci Osteria da Massimo Bottura, bidding farewell to Florence with a memorable culinary experience.
Transfer to Florence Airport for your flight home.

accommodation.hotel_name: Hotel Pitti Palace al Ponte Vecchio
